StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetNWADetailView]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @Star.ngRow int, @PageSize int, @FromDate date.me, @ToDate date.me, @OrgID int, @SortBy int, @FinalAc.on Varchar(20) ) AS
DECLARE @ac.on varchar(10) DECLARE @LastRow int SET @LastRow = @Star.ngRow + @PageSize - 1
IF (@FinalAc.on = 'X') SET @ac.on = 'ALL' ELSE SET @ac.on = @FinalAc.on
-- Get data .ltered by NWA_DECLARED_DATE , Org, and DISPOSITION DECLARE @FilterTable TABLE ( PERSON_ID int NULL, NWA_ID int NULL, ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID int NULL, SSN varchar(9) NULL, FIRST_NAME varchar(20) NULL, MIDDLE_NAME varchar(20) NULL, LAST_NAME varchar(20) NULL, SUFFIX varchar(5) NULL, DECL DateTime NULL, DSW DateTime NULL, AGE int NULL, GENDER_CODE varchar(1), RECRUITER_OF_RECORD_ID int NULL, NOTES varchar(50) NULL, DISPOSITION_CODE varchar(20) NULL, STATUS_TYPE varchar(4) NULL, RSS varchar(45) NULL, PROJECTED_SHIP_MONTH int NULL, EDUCATION_SortOrder int NULL, EDUCATION_LEVEL varchar(2) NULL, EDUCATION_CODE varchar(2) NULL, CATEGORY_CODE varchar(6) NULL, ASVAB_DATE date.me NULL, AFQT_SCORE int NULL, GT_SCORE int NULL, MEPS_CONTRACT_DATE date.me NULL )
INSERT INTO @FilterTable SELECT DISTINCT p.PERSON_ID, n.NWA_ID, n.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID, p.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER, p.FIRST_NAME, p.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME, p.LAST_NAME, p.SUFFIX_CD, n.NWA_DECLARED_DATE, n.NWA_DATE_STARTED_WORKING, Datedi.(year, mc.DATE_OF_BIRTH,getdate()), mc.GENDER_CODE, n.RECRUITER_OF_RECORD_ID, n.NWA_LOG_NOTES, cs.DISPOSITION_CODE, cs.STATUS_TYPE, rss.[NAME], n.PROJECTED_SHIP_MONTH, CASE ce.EDUCATION_LEVEL WHEN 'K' THEN 16 WHEN 'N' THEN 17 WHEN 'W' THEN 20 ELSE CAST(ce.EDUCATION_LEVEL as int) END, ce.EDUCATION_LEVEL, ce.EDUCATION_CODE, n.CATEGORY_CODE, null, null, null, null FROM dbo.PERSON p WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN NWA n on p.Person_ID = n.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID INNER JOIN [USMC].[vwRecrui.ngOrgIDs] vw ON n.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID = vw.root INNER JOIN RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION rss ON vw.RSS = rss.ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN CANDIDATE_STATUS cs ON cs.CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID = dbo.GetMaxStatusID(n.NWA_ID) INNER JOIN MARINE_CANDIDATE mc on p.Person_ID = mc.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID INNER JOIN CANDIDATE_EDUCATION CE ON ce.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = p.PERSON_ID AND (ce.SCHOOL_END_DATE = (SELECT MAX(a.SCHOOL_END_DATE) FROM CANDIDATE_EDUCATION a WHERE a.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = p.PERSON_ID)) WHERE NWA_DECLARED_DATE >= @FromDate AND NWA_DECLARED_DATE <= @ToDate AND (vw.RS = @OrgID OR vw.RSS = @OrgID OR vw.District = @OrgID OR vw.Region = @OrgID OR vw.HQ = @OrgID) AND ((@Ac.on = 'ALL') OR (DISPOSITION_CODE = @Ac.on)) AND NOT (STATUS_CODE = 'A' AND DISPOSITION_CODE = 'PA')
UPDATE @FilterTable SET ASVAB_DATE = ca.ASVAB_DATE, AFQT_SCORE = ca.AFQT_SCORE, GT_SCORE = ca.GT_SCORE FROM @FilterTable . INNER JOIN CANDIDATE_ASVAB ca ON ..Person_ID = ca.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID AND ca.ASVAB_DATE = (SELECT MAX(a.ASVAB_DATE) FROM CANDIDATE_ASVAB a WHERE a.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = ..PERSON_ID)
--First Set MEPS Contract Date base on Mir import UPDATE @FilterTable SET MEPS_CONTRACT_DATE = mi.[CONTRACT_BEGIN_DATE] FROM @FilterTable f INNER JOIN [dbo].[MIContract] mi on f.NWA_ID = mi.NWA_ID
--Second If contracted, use that to set MEPS Contract Date UPDATE @FilterTable SET MEPS_CONTRACT_DATE = n.MEPS_CONTRACT_DATE FROM @FilterTable f INNER JOIN [contract] n on f.NWA_ID = n.NWA_ID
-- Sort Data DECLARE @Sor.ngTable TABLE ( RowNumber int not null, PERSON_ID int NULL, NWA_ID int NULL, ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID int NULL, SSN varchar(9) NULL, FIRST_NAME varchar(20) NULL, MIDDLE_NAME varchar(20) NULL, LAST_NAME varchar(20) NULL, SUFFIX varchar(5) NULL, DECL DateTime NULL, DSW DateTime NULL, AGE int NULL, GENDER_CODE varchar(1), RECRUITER_OF_RECORD_ID int NULL, NOTES varchar(50) NULL, DISPOSITION_CODE varchar(20) NULL, STATUS_TYPE varchar(4) NULL, RSS varchar(45) NULL, PROJECTED_SHIP_MONTH int NULL, EDUCATION_SortOrder int NULL, EDUCATION_LEVEL varchar(2) NULL, EDUCATION_CODE varchar(2) NULL, CATEGORY_CODE varchar(6) NULL, ASVAB_DATE date.me NULL, AFQT_SCORE int NULL, GT_SCORE int NULL, MEPS_CONTRACT_DATE date.me NULL )
IF @SortBy = 1 INSERT INTO @Sor.ngTable SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(Order By ..DECL), ..* FROM @FilterTable . ORDER BY ..DECL IF @SortBy = 2 INSERT INTO @Sor.ngTable SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(Order By LAST_NAME, FIRST_NAME, MIDDLE_NAME), ..* FROM @FilterTable . ORDER BY LAST_NAME, FIRST_NAME, MIDDLE_NAME IF @SortBy = 3 INSERT INTO @Sor.ngTable SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(Order By ..GENDER_CODE), ..* FROM @FilterTable . ORDER BY ..GENDER_CODE IF @SortBy = 4 INSERT INTO @Sor.ngTable SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(Order By ..EDUCATION_SortOrder), ..* FROM @FilterTable . ORDER BY ..EDUCATION_SortOrder IF @SortBy = 5 INSERT INTO @Sor.ngTable SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(Order By ..RSS), ..* FROM @FilterTable . ORDER BY ..RSS IF @SortBy = 6 INSERT INTO @Sor.ngTable SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(Order By ..DISPOSITION_CODE), ..* FROM @FilterTable . ORDER BY ..DISPOSITION_CODE IF @SortBy = 7 INSERT INTO @Sor.ngTable SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(Order By ..MEPS_CONTRACT_DATE), ..* FROM @FilterTable . ORDER BY ..MEPS_CONTRACT_DATE DESC
-- Limit data to current page DECLARE @Grid TABLE ( RowNumber int not null, PERSON_ID int NULL, NWA_ID int NULL, ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID int NULL, SSN varchar(9) NULL, FIRST_NAME varchar(20) NULL, MIDDLE_NAME varchar(20) NULL, LAST_NAME varchar(20) NULL, SUFFIX varchar(5) NULL, DECL DateTime NULL, DSW DateTime NULL, AGE int NULL, GENDER_CODE varchar(1), RECRUITER_OF_RECORD_ID int NULL, NOTES varchar(50) NULL, DISPOSITION_CODE varchar(20) NULL, STATUS_TYPE varchar(4) NULL, RSS varchar(45) NULL, PROJECTED_SHIP_MONTH int NULL, EDUCATION_SortOrder int NULL, EDUCATION_LEVEL varchar(2) NULL, EDUCATION_CODE varchar(2) NULL, CATEGORY_CODE varchar(6) NULL, ASVAB_DATE date.me NULL, AFQT_SCORE int NULL, GT_SCORE int NULL, -- New Fields: CATEGORY_DESCRIPTION varchar(50) NULL, DISPOSITION_DESCRIPTION varchar(20) NULL, RECRUITER_NAME varchar(20) NULL, MEDICAL_EXAM_DATE date.me NULL, MEDICAL_DISPOSITION varchar(1) NULL, SOURCE_DESCRIPTION varchar(30) NULL, ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION varchar(25) NULL, PROFESSED_EXAM_TYPE varchar(1) NULL, PROFESSED_EXAM_SCORE int NULL, MEPS_CONTRACT_DATE date.me NULL )
IF (@FinalAc.on = 'X') BEGIN INSERT INTO @Grid SELECT *, null, null, null, null, null, null, null, null, MEPS_CONTRACT_DATE FROM @Sor.ngTable WHERE RowNumber >= @star.ngRow AND RowNumber <= @LastRow AND (DISPOSITION_CODE = 'F' OR DISPOSITION_CODE = 'DH')
END ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO @Grid SELECT *, null, null, null, null, null, null, null, null, MEPS_CONTRACT_DATE FROM @Sor.ngTable WHERE RowNumber >= @star.ngRow AND RowNumber <= @LastRow END
-- Get the last of the data needed for display UPDATE @Grid SET g.DISPOSITION_DESCRIPTION = fad.DISPOSITION_DESCRIPTION, g.RECRUITER_NAME = p.LAST_NAME FROM @Grid g INNER JOIN PERSON p on p.PERSON_ID = g.RECRUITER_OF_RECORD_ID INNER JOIN STATUS_DISPOSITION fad on g.DISPOSITION_CODE = fad.DISPOSITION_CODE
UPDATE @Grid SET MEDICAL_EXAM_DATE = cme.MEDICAL_EXAM_DATE, MEDICAL_DISPOSITION = cme.MEDICAL_DISPOSITION FROM @grid g, CANDIDATE_MEDICAL_EXAM cme WHERE g.person_id = cme.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID AND cme.MEDICAL_EXAM_DATE = (SELECT MAX(a.MEDICAL_EXAM_DATE) FROM CANDIDATE_MEDICAL_EXAM a WHERE a.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = g.PERSON_ID )
UPDATE @Grid SET CATEGORY_DESCRIPTION = CASE g.STATUS_TYPE WHEN 'E' THEN CASE n.CATEGORY_CODE WHEN 'R' THEN 'Regular' WHEN 'G' THEN 'Reserve-Ground' WHEN 'A' THEN 'Reseve-Air' WHEN 'P' THEN 'Prior-Service' WHEN 'O' THEN 'President''s Own' ELSE SPACE(0) END WHEN 'O' THEN COALESCE(cc.COMPONENT_DESCRIPTION, SPACE(0)) ELSE SPACE(0) END, SOURCE_DESCRIPTION = rs.SOURCE_DESCRIPTION, ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION = ra.ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION FROM @Grid g INNER JOIN NWA n on g.NWA_ID = n.NWA_ID INNER JOIN RECRUITING_SOURCE rs on n.SOURCE_CODE = rs.SOURCE_CODE INNER JOIN RECRUITING_ACTIVITY ra on n.ACTIVITY_CODE = ra.ACTIVITY_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN COMPONENT_CODE cc ON n.OFFICER_COMPONENT_CODE = cc.COMPONENT_CODE
UPDATE @Grid SET PROFESSED_EXAM_TYPE = cpe.PROFESSED_EXAM_TYPE, PROFESSED_EXAM_SCORE = cpe.EXAM_SCORE FROM @Grid g INNER JOIN CANDIDATE_PROFESSED_EXAM cpe ON cpe.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = g.PERSON_ID AND cpe.EXAM_DATE = (SELECT MAX(a.EXAM_DATE) FROM CANDIDATE_PROFESSED_EXAM a WHERE a.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = g.PERSON_ID)
-- Return the data SELECT * FROM @Grid
SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM @Sor.ngTable) AS En.reRowCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM @Grid) AS Total, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM @Grid WHERE CATEGORY_CODE = 'R' AND GENDER_CODE = 'M') AS RegularMales, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM @Grid WHERE CATEGORY_CODE = 'R' AND GENDER_CODE = 'F') AS RegularFemales, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM @Grid WHERE CATEGORY_CODE IN ('G', 'A') AND GENDER_CODE = 'M') AS ReserveMales, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM @Grid WHERE CATEGORY_CODE IN ('G', 'A') AND GENDER_CODE = 'F') AS ReserveFemales, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM @Grid WHERE AFQT_SCORE >=50 AND CATEGORY_CODE = 'R' AND GENDER_CODE = 'M') AS AlpahRegularMales
